section:
12.7.2.  During the Term, Accuray shall comply, in all material respects, with Siemens' Code of Conduct, attached hereto as Exhibit B (the "Code of Conduct"). Siemens shall give Accuray written notice of any change to its Code of Conduct as soon as reasonably practicable.
12.7.3.  During the Term, Distributor shall comply, in all material respects, with the Business Conduct Guidelines of Siemens and all other Siemens internal regulations and guidelines.
explanation: Sections 12.7.2 and 12.7.3 contain contradictory instructions. In 12.7.2, Accuray is instructed to follow Siemens' Code of Conduct, whereas 12.7.3 indicates that the Distributor (Siemens) must adhere to Siemens' Business Conduct Guidelines as well as other internal regulations. It is unclear whether 'Code of Conduct' in 12.7.2 and 'Business Conduct Guidelines' in 12.7.3 are the same document, or if these are different compliance standards. This discrepancy could create confusion regarding which specific guidelines each party is obligated to follow, potentially leading to compliance issues.

section:
12.17.  Entire Agreement. This Agreement and the Strategic Alliance Agreement contain the entire agreement of the parties hereto with
respect to the subject matter hereof, and supersedes all prior understandings, representations and warranties, written and oral. If
any part of the terms and conditions stated herein are held void or unenforceable, such part will be treated
     21
as severable, leaving valid the remainder of the terms and conditions. In case of any contradiction between this Agreement and the
Strategic Alliance Agreement, the terms of this Agreement shall prevail.
explanation: This clause includes a structural flaw in text because the text is referencing a page number that is not shown. The page number shown above is 21, which is not the proper page number for the file as it continues with other information on other pages.

section:
EXHIBIT A     DISTRIBUTOR DISCOUNTS ON PRODUCTS AND SERVICES



* Siemens distributor channel discount.     Siemens Bundled Sales Price= (List Price (1- (Volume Discount + Distributor Discount))
explanation: There is a structural flaw in the text because the paragraph does not make sense and the sentence ends abruptly.
